response.original_title: Jornada Internacional de Cinema da Bahia: Por um mundo mais humano
response.overview: The documentary shows the Journey at the Brazilian Culture ICU and his death shortly after, along with its creator and morator, Gido Ara√∫jo.  The film takes a journey through the 35 years of existence and resistance of the most important cinema movement in Bahia.  The most prestigious filmmakers from Brazil and many others from different countries passed through the Journey, always keeping the motto in mind: for a more humane world.
response.title: Jornada Internacional de Cinema da Bahia: Por um mundo mais humano
